Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.gui

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.gmp.util.gui.Utility
public class Utility extends Object
Static support functions for LSINV. Functions include properties set, date prepend, io directory initialization, row/column block exist test, screen writer output mode set, and properties retrieval and output for tomography, sparse to partitioned, and partitioned to blocked solutions.
Author:
jrhipp

  • Method Details

    • setProperties

      public static PropertiesPlus setProperties(String propFileName, boolean... verbose) throws IOException
      Creates a PropertiesPlus reader from the input properties file name string.
      Parameters:
      propFileName - The file name containing the input properties.
      verbose - Optional parameter that if set to true outputs the property file that is being read.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • prependDate

      public static String prependDate(String inFName)
      Prepends the current date string "yyyy_MM_dd" to the front of the input string replacing the occurrence "(DATE)" if it is present. Otherwise the input string is simply returned.
      Parameters:
      inFName - The input string for which "(DATE)" will be replaced with the current date.
      Returns:
      The new input string with "(DATE)" replaced with the current date string.

    • initializeDirectory

      public static String initializeDirectory(PropertiesPlus props, ScreenWriterOutput scrnWrtr, boolean... appnd) throws IOException
      Defines, initializes, and sets the "ioDirectory" property.
      Parameters:
      props - The properties file.
      scrnWrtr - The screen writer
      appnd - Opens to log file for append if true.
      Returns:
      The new "ioDirectory" path.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initializeDirectory

      public static String initializeDirectory(String basePath, PropertiesPlus props, ScreenWriterOutput scrnWrtr, boolean... appnd) throws IOException
      Defines, initializes, and sets the "ioDirectory" property.
      Parameters:
      basePath - The input IO directory base path.
      props - The properties file.
      scrnWrtr - The screen writer
      appnd - Opens to log file for append if true.
      Returns:
      The new "ioDirectory" path.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • rowColBlockExist

      public static boolean rowColBlockExist(MatrixBlockFileServer srvrs, String typ, int row, int col) throws IOException
      Returns true if the block at row, col exists. Otherwise false is returned.
      Parameters:
      typ - The type of blocks (matrix) to be checked for existence.
      row - The starting row index.
      col - The starting column index.
      Returns:
      true if the block at row, col exists.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setOutputWriterMode

      public static void setOutputWriterMode(PropertiesPlus props, ScreenWriterOutput scrnWrtr) throws IOException
      Sets the screen/file output modes for the GeoTomography, IODB, and LSQR writers based on the output model property
      Parameters:
      props - The properties object from which the "outputMode" is read.
      scrnWrtr - The ScreenWriterOutput object whose output mode is set.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getPartitionedSparseMatrixProperties

      public static PropertiesPlus getPartitionedSparseMatrixProperties(String prtSprsMtrxPath) throws IOException
      Returns the partitioned sparse matrix properties object given a path to the directory containing the partitioned sparse matrix. This function is usually called by PartitionedSparseToBlocked.
      Parameters:
      prtSprsMtrxPath - The path to the partitioned sparse matrix properties directory
      Returns:
      The partitioned sparse matrix properties object.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • outputPartitionedSparseMatrixInfo

      public static void outputPartitionedSparseMatrixInfo(String indent, String prtSprsMtrxPath, ScreenWriterOutput scrnWrtr) throws IOException
      Returns the sparse matrix to partitioned sparse matrix properties object given a path to the directory containing the properties file.
      Parameters:
      indent - Amount of space to prepend to each output line.
      prtSprsMtrxPath - The path to the properties file.
      scrnWrtr - The input screen writer.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • outputTomographyInformation

      public static void outputTomographyInformation(String indent, String sprsMtrxPath, ScreenWriterOutput scrnWrtr) throws IOException
      Returns the tomography properties object given a path to the directory containing the properties file.
      Parameters:
      indent - Amount of space to prepend to each output line.
      sprsMtrxPath - The path to the properties file.
      scrnWrtr - The input screen writer.
      Throws:
